commit.message:
BufferedOutputStream.java (write(int)): Only flush when next byte cannot be buffered.

       * java/io/BufferedOutputStream.java (write(int)): Only flush when
       next byte cannot be buffered.

From-SVN: r62867

files.patch:

+
+	* java/io/BufferedOutputStream.java (write(int)): Only flush when
+	next byte cannot be buffered.
